aShell You
Access denied You might need to accept a prompt on the other device if you are trying to connect to it for the first time from this device ADB device connected. ADB device not connected. Waiting for ADB device ADB shell About Accept Amoled black theme Pure black theme for devices with OLED panel aShell You is here for all your ADB needs aShell You is still working. Please wait for it to finish or manually stop (by clicking the stop button) to run a new command
This feature is currently in its experimental phase. If you encounter any issues please let me know. Bookmarks '%s' is bookmarked Maximum bookmark limit reached! Delete some bookmarks to add new ones '%s' has been removed from bookmark Cancel Changelogs Are you sure you want to clear everything on this screen? Clear everything Clear screen Clipboard doesn't contain text Commands Input ADB command here Input ADB Command connecting... confirm authorization on target device "Copy" Device not connected Discord Join the discord community Dismiss Disabled Don't show again Error Example Examples Failed Failed to generate and save key pair Flashing ‚ö° Flashing Apks Go back History No command Ok Open ADB shell Device is not properly connected. Connect the device properly through OTG and try again Paste Press back again to exit aShell You is still working. Do you want to stop the current process? Progress Quit Do you want to quit aShell You? Ready Flash Apks Request Permission Save Root commands are not available Search Settings setAdbInterface(device, intf) fail Auto run shared commands If enabled then sharing any text to aShell You automatically runs the shell with the shared text as input The output of last command is not saved The output of last command is exported to '%s' folder Shell is working About Shizuku Access to Shizuku service is denied for aShell You. aShell You won't work without a proper Shizuku environment. Shizuku is unavailable Shizuku is not installed or not properly configured on your device. aShell You won't work without a proper Shizuku environment. Start Success Support aShell You is not designed for root-related uses. Aborting. Setup Apks Use Waiting for device Warning Yes
Smooth scrolling Enables smooth scrolling in the shell output when top or bottom arrow is clicked Ask before clearing shell output If enabled a confirmation popup will show after you click the Clear screen button Override maximum bookmarks limit Might cause lag if a large number of bookmarks are added! Low end devices should keep this option turned off Disable soft keyboard Usefull when you want to use an external keyboard Collection of some command templates History of all the changes made to the app Version , Credits Lead developer Just a guy who loves apps and design Contributors Developer of Shizuku
The main functionality provider of aShell You Developer of aShell
Without him aShell You wouldn't exist Developer of ADB‚ö°OTG
Thanks to him OTG feature could be implemented in aShell You He is the website developer , tester , channel manager and a lot more

Thanks for your support buddy ü§ó Developer of Iconify
Helped me fix issues in aShell You ü§ù A freelancer translator who did the Portuguese translations The guy who did the Chinese translations App Version Report an issue Report any issue you have faced while using the app Feature request If you have any ideas or suggestions in your mind , let me know Github Visit the github repository of aShell You Telegram channel Join the telegram channel for discussion //Changelogs //Absolutely necessary to follow this string name format


‚Ä¢ Fixed some crashes that were introduced in v3.8.0 

‚Ä¢ Added black (amoled) theme

‚Ä¢ Added undo button to undo paste

‚Ä¢ Added option to disable soft keyboard

‚Ä¢ Fixed buttons stretched in some screen sizes

‚Ä¢ Fixed bookmarks button not appearing after opening the app

‚Ä¢ Renamed Examples section to Commands

‚Ä¢ Fixed copy command option not appearing for every command template

‚Ä¢ App now uses system font everywhere

‚Ä¢ Improved UI handling

‚Ä¢ Updated translations


‚Ä¢ Now you can share texts from anywhere on your device to aShell You and run commands directly.

‚Ä¢ Now you can share shell output directly without needing to save it !

‚Ä¢ A lot of optimisations and UI handling.

‚Ä¢ Added Chinese translations.

‚Ä¢ Updated translations.


‚Ä¢ Added option to clear the command input field after an error

‚Ä¢ Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash upon pasting from clipboard under certain conditions

‚Ä¢ Code optimisations 

‚Ä¢ Fixed some issues with bottom navigation.


‚Ä¢ Revamped About section of the app.

‚Ä¢ Added launcher shortcuts.

‚Ä¢ Fixed navigation menu not showing in button navigation.

‚Ä¢ Improved bottom navigation menu visibility on scrolling.

‚Ä¢ Added per app language support for aShell You (translations aren't completed yet).

‚Ä¢ A lot of code optimisations.


‚Ä¢ Added a Paste button so that you can copy and paste commands quickly.

‚Ä¢ Added Error indicators in the text input field.

‚Ä¢ Improved Navigation Bar visibility logic.

‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where switches misbehaves under certain situations.

‚Ä¢ Fixed add bookmark icon visibility in various contrast levels.

‚Ä¢ A lot of code optimisation. App now opens a lot faster than before.

‚Ä¢ App will stay in background and won't restart every time you close the app by just pressing the back button or gesture.


‚Ä¢ Added bookmarks , history and command suggestions to OTG

‚Ä¢ Added maximum bookmarks limit.

‚Ä¢ Added option to override maximum bookmarks limit.

‚Ä¢ A lot of bug fixes.

‚Ä¢ Improved some UI handling.

‚Ä¢ A lot of code optimisation.


‚Ä¢ A lot of UI related improvements.

‚Ä¢ Added chips that indicate current ADB working mode.

‚Ä¢ A lot of code optimisation.


‚Ä¢ Improvements to ADB OTG after initial release.

‚Ä¢ Some UI and logic adjustments to accomodate the new otg feature.


‚Ä¢ Added ADB THROUGH OTG support.

 *** You will be able to run ADB commands on other devices using aShellYou by connecting the other device using an OTG cable ***


‚Ä¢ Removed unnecessary code and resources.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.


‚Ä¢ Removed unnecessary code and resources.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.


‚Ä¢ Changed app name to aShell You.

‚Ä¢ Added predictive back animations for supporting devices.

‚Ä¢ Added confirmation dialog popup before clearing screen.

‚Ä¢ Fixed StatusBar elements not properly visible in Light mode.

‚Ä¢ App is much more smooth now.
 ~ Reduced app size and optimised code.

‚Ä¢ Added themed icon for launchers that support themed icons.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.


‚Ä¢ Revamped Settings panel.

‚Ä¢ Added Double Tap to instant scroll to top and bottom positions in shell output view.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI fixes.


‚Ä¢ Added Settings panel.

‚Ä¢ Added option to disable smooth scroll in shell output.

‚Ä¢ Fixed major bugs:

 ~ Crash while changing device theme.

 ~ Crash while trying to save large shell output . eg : output of 'pm' command.


‚Ä¢ Replaced some deprecated api.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.


‚Ä¢ Added Scroll To Top and Scroll To Bottom buttons.

‚Ä¢ Added Click keyboard Enter key to Send command.

‚Ä¢ Added some commands.

‚Ä¢ Updated dependencies to include latest material you library.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.


‚Ä¢ Added some more command examples.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.

‚Ä¢ Changed package name to avoid version confusion with original app.


‚Ä¢ Added changelogs into the app.

‚Ä¢ Added highlighted shell output.

‚Ä¢ Minor UI changes.


‚Ä¢ Added dynamic material theming.

‚Ä¢ Revamped whole UI to give a fresh look.
